bibl.title: Coins from Nag Hammadi in the Graeco-Roman Museum in Alexandria.
Aegyptiaca serta in Soheir Bakhoum memoriam. Mélanges de numismatique, d'iconographie et d'histoire

bibl.note: Catalogue of the coins [Nos 1-264, mostly Roman imperial coinage (after the reform of Diocletian)].
bibl.seg: Mervat Seif el Din & Faiza El Maghrabi, Coins from Nag Hammadi in the Graeco-Roman Museum in Alexandria.

Dominique Gerin, Angelo Geissen & Michel Amandry (edd.), Aegyptiaca serta in Soheir Bakhoum memoriam. Mélanges de numismatique, d'iconographie et d'histoire = Collezioni numismatiche. 7 (Milano, 2008) pp. 95-112, 3 tabl.
Catalogue of the coins [Nos 1-264, mostly Roman imperial coinage (after the reform of Diocletian)].
